pages.title: Block Puller
pages.text: A multiblock structure that pulls ores from the... well, from nothing really. The higher you build it, the faster it pulls. Requires some energy per operation.

By dropping different shards inside the liquid you can try and filter the ores that are pulled. Different shards will pull different ores, but remember that no filter is 100% effective! Test with different shards to learn the items that are filtered.$(br2)A redstone signal to any of the 8 Heat Blocks will completely disable the puller.

pages.name: Puller
pages.text: Adding more lines equal to the lowest one, as seen on the right, will make the puller pull faster.
Materials Required:$(br)$(li)1 Bucket of Liquid Souls$(li)1 Puller Block$(li)4 Light Collectors$(li)5 Amplifying Tubes$(li)8 Heat Blocks$(li)12 Heavy Protection Blocks+
